reuters.title: BEVIS INDUSTRIES SEEKS BUYER FOR COMPANY
reuters.body: <Bevis Industries Inc> said it retained Tucker Anthony and R.L. Day Inc to seek purchasers of the company or its units. It issued no further details. The company, which makes stainless steel tubing for the chemical, petrochemical, and oil industries, earned 1,045,000 dlrs or 51 cts a share in the nine months ending September 30, 1986. It had sales of 17.1 mln dlrs in the period. Reuter 
